item.title: The invisible attack surface: hunting AI threats in Defender XDR
item.description: As organizations embed AI across their business, the same technology that drives productivity also introduces a new class of risk: prompts that can be manipulated, data that can be leaked, and AI systems that can be tricked into doing things they shouldn’t. Attackers are already testing these boundaries, and defenders need visibility into how AI is being used - not just where it’s deployed. Microsoft Defender for Cloud now brings that visibility into the hunt.
